pages.text: $(thing)Purple Steel$() is the ultimate metal. An $(l:mechanics/crucible#advanced_alloying)Alloy$() consisting of $(thing)Blue Steel$() and $(thing)Red Steel$(), purple steel can be cast into ingots, welded into double ingots, and worked into sheets for crafting. Purple Steel is the strongest metal; mastering both hot and cold temperatures, and bolstering the highest durability.

pages.title: Weak Purple Steel
pages.text: $(br)$(bold)Requirements:$()$(br)$(li)50 % : $(thing)Blue Steel$()$(li)50 % : $(thing)Red Steel$()$(br2) $(br2)First, blue and red steel must be alloyed together to make $(thing)Weak Purple Steel$().

pages.title: Purple Steel
pages.text: In the $(l:mechanics/blast_furnace)Blast Furnace$(), combine $(thing)Weak Purple Steel$(), $(thing)Graphite Powder$(), and $(thing)Charcoal$().$(br2)The resultant $(thing)Purple Steel$() will be the strongest metal specimen obtainable by mortal hands.

$(thing)Purple Steel$() is a very sturdy metal, and as such, cannot be easily manipulated. Sheets, rods, and wires are only obtainable through the strength of machines. All other processes are completed on a $(l:mechanics/anvils)Tier VI Anvil$().
